youtube_video_description: This video features magician VEVE, a celebrated magician from Osaka, Japan, known for his mastery of magic and juggling. In this particular short video, he presents three simple magic tricks that anyone can perform. The engaging performance is likely accompanied by music, showcasing his skills while appealing to a wide audience on platforms like TikTok and YouTube Shorts.
hint_prompt: Analyze the frames from the video to determine how many lighters the man is holding in his hand during the performance.
